tasks.task: Propagate kale plants in containers
subtasks: Identify a suitable container (average size, with drainage holes)
Choose a location with adequate sunlight (adjust container placement as needed)
Ensure proper soil fertility using organic manure
Transplant kale plants at the same time to avoid shade competition
Water containers adequately, managing water retention and drainage
Monitor and manage pests and diseases in container-grown plants
Consider expanding container gardening for increased vegetable production

tasks.task: Discuss the benefits of container gardening
subtasks: Moving containers to optimal sunlight locations
Reduced water needs compared to in-ground gardens
Easier pest and disease management in limited container numbers
Versatility in plant spacing and timing for growth

tasks.task: Share knowledge on container gardening for home consumption
subtasks: Encourage viewers to mention their container-grown plants in comments
Promote subscribing to the channel for continued gardening content

tasks.task: Setup a container garden for kale
subtasks: Select a suitable container with proper drainage
Choose a location that receives adequate sunlight

tasks.task: Ensure plants receive adequate sunlight
subtasks: Position containers in a location that receives sufficient direct sunshine
Monitor and adjust container positions as needed

tasks.task: Set up a container garden for kale
Discuss the benefits of container gardening
Engage with the gardening community
subtasks: Participate in Q&As or comments sections to share container gardening experiences
Subscribe to the gardening channel for more content

MAINTASK: Propagate and care for kale plants in a container garden. Subtasks include container selection, location, organic soil, spacing, watering, drainage, and pest monitoring. Additionally, the benefits (mobility, reduced water, easy pest management) can be noted, but as ancillary information. Community engagement (comments, subscribing) is more of the video's goal, not physical tasks. Hence, the answer should focus on the actual activities a person would perform. However, when I created the original answer, I included the three tasks with subtasks as per the direction. Let me confirm:
Propagate kale plants in containers
Discuss the benefits of container gardening
Share knowledge on container gardening
Propagate and care for kale plants in container gardens
Discuss the advantages and benefits of container gardening
